name: CreateEventInvitee
description:
Create a new event invitee on Calendly.

This tool is used to create a new event invitee on Calendly. It triggers standard notifications, calendar invites, reschedules, and workflows as if booked via the Calendly interface. Note that only users on paid Calendly plans can access this feature.

parameters.name: invitee_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for creating an event invitee, including event type, start time, invitee information (name, email, etc.), location, questions and answers, tracking, and optionally event guests' emails (max 10).

event_type.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the event type being scheduled

start_time.description: The start time in UTC of the scheduled event

name.description: The full name of the invitee. **Required if** `first_name` **is not provided**

first_name.description: The first name of the invitee. **Required if** `name` **is not provided**

last_name.description: The last name of the invitee

text_reminder_number.description: Invitee's phone number for SMS reminders. Must be a valid phone number (e.g. +14155551234)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

event_type.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the event type being scheduled

start_time.description: The start time in UTC of the scheduled event

name.description: The full name of the invitee. **Required if** `first_name` **is not provided**

first_name.description: The first name of the invitee. **Required if** `name` **is not provided**

last_name.description: The last name of the invitee

text_reminder_number.description: Invitee's phone number for SMS reminders. Must be a valid phone number (e.g. +14155551234)

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
